article:
I need _ English dictionary. I go to the bookstore  . There are many books _ it. I can't find the dictionaries. So I ask a girl, "Excuse _ , where _ the dictionaries?" " _ are in the last bookcase." says the girl. "Thanks." I say. With her help, I buy the dictionary. Then I go home happily.
On my way home, I see something on the floor  . _ that? Is it a _ ? Yes, it is. it's a black wallet  . Oh, There is a photo _ a man _ some money in it. I find a telephone number at the back of (...) the photo. _ 758897. So I call it. Finally, the man comes and gets back   the wallet.
The girl helps me and I help the man. It's good to help others.
